trans-unit.target: 在未打开的文件句柄上执行tell（）
函数相似性_语言_标签（$ lang1，$ lang2）

trans-unit.source: the source name of a test to run
time_t issues that may or may not be fixed
trans-unit.target: time_t问题可能会解决，也可能不会解决

trans-unit.source: unable to map [group] to a gid, group ownership not changed
trans-unit.target: 无法将[group]映射到gid，群组所有权未更改

trans-unit.source: unable to map [owner] to a uid, ownership not changed");
trans-unit.target: 无法将[所有者]映射到uid，所有权未更改”）；

trans-unit.source: undocumented, used internally by the overload feature
trans-unit.target: 未记录，由过载功能在内部使用

trans-unit.source: untie attempted while %d inner references still exist
trans-unit.target: ％d内部引用仍然存在时尝试取消绑定

trans-unit.source: vector argument not supported with alpha versions
walk_output lets you change the print destination from STDOUT to another open filehandle, or into a string passed as a ref (unless you've built perl with -Uuseperlio).
trans-unit.target: walk_output可让您将打印目标从STDOUT更改为另一个打开的文件句柄，或更改为作为ref传递的字符串（除非已使用-Uuseperlio构建了perl）。

trans-unit.source: xsubpp emits an automatic SvSETMAGIC() for all parameters in the OUTPUT section of the XSUB, except RETVAL. This is the usually desired behavior, as it takes care of properly invoking 'set' magic on output parameters (needed for hash or array element parameters that must be created if they didn't exist). If for some reason, this behavior is not desired, the OUTPUT section may contain a SETMAGIC: DISABLE line to disable it for the remainder of the parameters in the OUTPUT section. Likewise, SETMAGIC: ENABLE can be used to reenable it for the remainder of the OUTPUT section. See perlguts for more details about 'set' magic.
trans-unit.target: xsubpp会为XSUB的OUTPUT部分中的所有参数 SvSETMAGIC() RETVAL除外）发出一个自动SvSETMAGIC（）。这是通常需要的行为，因为它会适当地在输出参数上调用“设置”魔术（需要为散列或数组元素参数创建，如果不存在则必须创建这些参数）。如果出于某种原因，这种行为是不希望的，则OUTPUT部分可能包含 SETMAGIC: DISABLE 行，以针对OUTPUT部分中的其余参数禁用它。同样， SETMAGIC: ENABLE 可用于在OUTPUT部分的其余部分重新启用它。有关“设置”魔术的更多详细信息，请参见perlguts。

trans-unit.source: xsubpp will parse the following function argument lists identically:
trans-unit.target: xsubpp将相同地解析以下函数参数列表：

trans-unit.source: !~ determines to which variable the regex is applied, and negates the result of the match; it returns false if the match succeeds, and true if it fails.
trans-unit.target: !~ 确定将正则表达式应用于哪个变量，并否定匹配结果；如果匹配成功，则返回false；如果失败，则返回true。

trans-unit.source: "+" for union, "-" for removal (set-difference), "&" for intersection
trans-unit.target: "+" 表示并集， "-" 表示去除（集差）， "&" 表示交集

trans-unit.source: "++" and "--" work as in C. That is, if placed before a variable, they increment or decrement the variable by one before returning the value, and if placed after, increment or decrement after returning the value.
trans-unit.target: "++" 和 "--" 工作方式与C相同。也就是说，如果放置在变量之前，则在返回值之前将变量递增或递减1，如果放置在变量之后，则返回值之后则递增或递减。

trans-unit.source: ":loose" has no effect with these. Input names must match exactly, using ":full" rules.
trans-unit.target: ":loose" 对这些无效。输入名称必须使用 ":full" 规则完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: "LATIN CAPITAL LETTER E WITH ACUTE" is called a "pre-composed" character, and its equivalence with the "E" and the "COMBINING ACCENT" sequence is called canonical equivalence. All pre-composed characters are said to have a decomposition (into the equivalent sequence), and the decomposition type is also called canonical. A string may be comprised as much as possible of precomposed characters, or it may be comprised of entirely decomposed characters. Unicode calls these respectively, "Normalization Form Composed" (NFC) and "Normalization Form Decomposed". The Unicode::Normalize module contains functions that convert between the two. A string may also have both composed characters and decomposed characters; this module can be used to make it all one or the other.
trans-unit.target: "LATIN CAPITAL LETTER E WITH ACUTE" 大写字母E”被称为“预合成”字符，其与“ E”和“ COMBINING ACCENT”序列的等价称为规范等价。据说所有预先组成的字符都有分解（分解为等效序列），分解类型也称为规范。字符串可以包含尽可能多的预组合字符，也可以包含完全分解的字符。 Unicode分别将它们称为“标准化形式组合”（NFC）和“标准化形式分解”。该 Unicode::Normalize 模块包含两个之间的转换功能。字符串也可以同时包含组成字符和分解字符；此模块可用于使它们全部或全部。

trans-unit.source: "console" - send messages directly to the console, as for the "cons" option of openlog() .
trans-unit.target: "console" -将消息直接发送到控制台，就像 openlog() 的 "cons" 选项一样。

trans-unit.source: "eventlog" - send messages to the Win32 events logger (Win32 only; added in Sys::Syslog 0.19).
trans-unit.target: "eventlog" -将消息发送到Win32事件记录器（仅Win32；已添加到 Sys::Syslog 0.19中）。

trans-unit.source: "inet" - connect to an INET socket, either TCP or UDP, tried in that order. See also the host , port and timeout options.
trans-unit.target: "inet" -按该顺序连接到INET套接字（TCP或UDP）。另请参见 host ， port 和 timeout 选项。

trans-unit.source: "lt" , "le" , "ge" , "gt" and "cmp" use the collation (sort) order specified by the current LC_COLLATE locale if a use locale form that includes collation is in effect. See perllocale. Do not mix these with Unicode, only use them with legacy 8-bit locale encodings. The standard Unicode::Collate and Unicode::Collate::Locale modules offer much more powerful solutions to collation issues.
trans-unit.target: "lt" 如果有效的包含排序规则的 use locale 语言环境形式，则“ lt”， "le" ， "ge" ， "gt" 和 "cmp" 使用当前 LC_COLLATE 语言环境指定的排序规则（排序）顺序。参见perllocale。不要将它们与Unicode混合使用，而只能将它们与旧式8位语言环境编码一起使用。标准的 Unicode::Collate 和 Unicode::Collate::Locale 模块为解决排序规则问题提供了更强大的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: "native" - use the native C functions from your syslog(3) library (added in Sys::Syslog 0.15).
trans-unit.target: "native" -使用 syslog(3) 库中的本机C函数（已添加到 Sys::Syslog 0.15中）。

trans-unit.source: "pipe" - connect to the named pipe indicated by the path option, or, if omitted, to the value returned by the _PATH_LOG macro (if your system defines it), or
trans-unit.target: "pipe" -连接到 path 选项指示的命名管道，或者，如果省略，则连接到 _PATH_LOG 宏返回的值（如果您的系统定义了它），或者

trans-unit.source: "stream" - connect to the stream indicated by the path option, or, if omitted, the value returned by the _PATH_LOG macro (if your system defines it),
trans-unit.target: "stream" -连接到 path 选项指示的流，或者连接到 _PATH_LOG 宏（如果您的系统定义了）的值（如果省略的话），

trans-unit.source: "tcp" - connect to a TCP socket, on the syslog/tcp or syslogng/tcp service. See also the host , port and timeout options.
trans-unit.target: "tcp" -连接到 syslog/tcp 或 syslogng/tcp 服务上的TCP套接字。另请参见 host ， port 和 timeout 选项。

trans-unit.source: "udp" - connect to a UDP socket, on the syslog/udp service. See also the host , port and timeout options.
trans-unit.target: "udp" -连接到 syslog/udp 服务上的UDP套接字。另请参见 host ， port 和 timeout 选项。

trans-unit.source: "unix" - connect to a UNIX domain socket (in some systems a character special device). The name of that socket is given by the path option or, if omitted, the value returned by the _PATH_LOG macro (if your system defines it),
trans-unit.target: "unix" -连接到UNIX域套接字（在某些系统中是字符特殊设备）。该套接字的名称由 path 选项指定，如果省略，则由 _PATH_LOG 宏返回的值（如果您的系统定义了），

trans-unit.source: $# was a variable that could be used to format printed numbers. After a deprecation cycle, its magic was removed in Perl v5.10.0 and using it now triggers a warning: $# is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: $# 是一个可用于格式化打印数字的变量。在弃用周期之后，Perl v5.10.0中删除了它的魔力，现在使用它会触发警告： $# is no longer supported 。

trans-unit.source: $< , $> , $( and $) can be set only on machines that support the corresponding
trans-unit.target: $< ， $> ， $( 和 $) 只能在支持相应功能的机器上设置

trans-unit.source: $< and $> can be swapped only on machines supporting setreuid() .
trans-unit.target: $< 和 $> 只能在支持 setreuid() 的机器上交换。

trans-unit.source: $* was a variable that you could use to enable multiline matching. After a deprecation cycle, its magic was removed in Perl v5.10.0. Using it now triggers a warning: $* is no longer supported. You should use the /s and /m regexp modifiers instead.
trans-unit.target: $* 是可用于启用多行匹配的变量。在弃用周期之后，Perl v5.10.0中删除了它的魔力。现在使用它会触发警告： $* is no longer supported 。您应该改用 /s 和 /m regexp修饰符。

trans-unit.source: $-[0] is the offset of the start of the last successful match. $-[
trans-unit.target: $-[0] 是上一次成功匹配开始的偏移量。 $-[

trans-unit.source: $. is reset when the filehandle is closed, but not when an open filehandle is reopened without an intervening close(). For more details, see I/O Operators in perlop. Because <> never does an explicit close, line numbers increase across ARGV files (but see examples in eof).
trans-unit.target: $. 在关闭文件句柄时重置，但是在没有介入 close() 的情况下重新打开打开的文件句柄时，不会重置。有关更多详细信息，请参见perlop中的I / O运算符。因为 <> 从不进行明确的关闭，所以 ARGV 文件中的行号会增加（但请参见eof中的示例）。

trans-unit.source: $1 , $2 , ... should only be used outside of a regex, and \g1 , \g2 , ... only inside a regex.
trans-unit.target: $1 ， $2 ，...仅应在正则表达式外部使用， \g1 ， \g2 ，...仅应在正则表达式内部使用。

trans-unit.source: $@ is set if the string to be eval-ed did not compile (this may happen if open or close were imported with bad prototypes), or if Perl code executed during evaluation die()d. In these cases the value of $@ is the compile error, or the argument to die (which will interpolate $! and $? ). (See also Fatal, though.)
trans-unit.target: $@ 如果要 eval 的字符串未编译（如果 open 或 close 导入的原型不正确），或者在评估 die() d 期间执行了Perl代码，则可能设置$ @。在这些情况下， $@ 的值是编译错误，或者是 die 的参数（将对 $! 和 $? 进行插值）。（不过，也请参阅《致命》。）

trans-unit.source: $Carp::CarpLevel can be set to skip a fixed number of additional call levels. Using this is not recommended because it is very difficult to get it to behave correctly.
trans-unit.target: $Carp::CarpLevel 可以将$ Carp :: CarpLevel设置为跳过固定数量的其他呼叫级别。不建议使用此功能，因为很难使其正常运行。

trans-unit.source: $Config{longlongsize} is undefined on systems without long long support.
trans-unit.target: $Config{longlongsize} 在没有长期支持的系统上，$ Config {longlongsize}是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: $ExtUtils::Manifest::Debug defaults to 0. If set to a true value, or if PERL_MM_MANIFEST_DEBUG is true, debugging output will be produced.
trans-unit.target: $ExtUtils::Manifest::Debug 默认值为0。如果设置为true值，或者PERL_MM_MANIFEST_DEBUG为true，则将生成调试输出。

trans-unit.source: $ExtUtils::Manifest::MANIFEST defaults to MANIFEST . Changing it results in both a different MANIFEST and a different MANIFEST.SKIP file. This is useful if you want to maintain different distributions for different audiences (say a user version and a developer version including RCS).
trans-unit.target: $ExtUtils::Manifest::MANIFEST 默认为 MANIFEST 。更改它会导致一个不同的 MANIFEST 和一个不同的 MANIFEST.SKIP 文件。如果您想为不同的受众群体维护不同的发行版（例如，用户版本和包括RCS的开发人员版本），这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: $ExtUtils::Manifest::Quiet defaults to 0. If set to a true value, all functions act silently.
trans-unit.target: $ExtUtils::Manifest::Quiet 默认为0。如果设置为true值，则所有函数均以静默方式运行。

trans-unit.source: $^V can be used to determine whether the Perl interpreter executing a script is in the right range of versions. For example:
trans-unit.target: $^V 可用于确定执行脚本的Perl解释器是否在正确的版本范围内。例如：

trans-unit.source: $_ is by default a global variable. However, as of perl v5.10.0, you can use a lexical version of $_ by declaring it in a file or in a block with my. Moreover, declaring our $_ restores the global $_ in the current scope. Though this seemed like a good idea at the time it was introduced, lexical $_ actually causes more problems than it solves. If you call a function that expects to be passed information via $_ , it may or may not work, depending on how the function is written, there not being any easy way to solve this. Just avoid lexical $_ , unless you are feeling particularly masochistic. For this reason lexical $_ is still experimental and will produce a warning unless warnings have been disabled. As with other experimental features, the behavior of lexical $_ is subject to change without notice, including change into a fatal error.
trans-unit.target: $_ 默认为全局变量。但是，从perl v5.10.0起，您可以使用 $_ 的词法版本，方法是使用 my 在文件或块中声明$ _。此外，声明 our $_ 恢复全球 $_ 在当前范围内。尽管在引入时这似乎是一个好主意，但词汇 $_ 实际上引起的问题多于解决的问题。如果您调用一个希望通过 $_ 传递信息的函数，则该函数可能会或可能不会起作用，这取决于该函数的编写方式，因此没有任何简单的方法可以解决此问题。只要避免使用词汇 $_ ，除非您感到特别受虐。因此，词汇 $_ 仍处于实验阶段，除非禁用警告，否则将产生警告。与其他实验功能一样，词汇 $_ 的行为如有更改，恕不另行通知，包括更改为致命错误。

trans-unit.source: $a[1] is one of these references. It refers to an array, the array containing (4, 5, 6) , and because it is a reference to an array, Use Rule 2 says that we can write $a[1]->[2] to get the third element from that array. $a[1]->[2] is the 6. Similarly, $a[0]->[1] is the 2. What we have here is like a two-dimensional array; you can write $a[ROW]->[COLUMN] to get or set the element in any row and any column of the array.
trans-unit.target: $a[1] 是这些引用之一。它引用一个数组，该数组包含 (4, 5, 6) ，并且由于它是对数组的引用，因此使用规则2表示我们可以编写 $a[1]->[2] 来获取第三个元素从那个数组。 $a[1]->[2] 是6。类似地， $a[0]->[1] 是2。这里我们有一个二维数组；您可以编写 $a[ROW]->[COLUMN] 来获取或设置数组中任何行和任何列中的元素。

trans-unit.source: $bar . The one that was stuffed away by local() and which will be restored when the block ends. Because variables are accessed through the typeglob, you can use *foo = *bar to create an alias which can be localized. (But be aware that this means you can't have a separate @foo and @bar , etc.)
trans-unit.target: $bar 。被 local() 塞满的那个，当块结束时将被恢复。因为变量是通过typeglob访问的，所以可以使用 *foo = *bar 创建可以本地化的别名。（但是请注意，这意味着您不能单独使用 @foo 和 @bar 等）

trans-unit.source: $basename is the base filename for the database. The database is two files with ".dir" and ".pag" extensions appended to $basename ,
trans-unit.target: $basename 是数据库的基本文件名。该数据库是两个文件，在文件的 $basename 后面附加了扩展名为“ .dir”和“ .pag”的文件，

trans-unit.source: $code_point should be an unsigned integer representing a Unicode code point.
trans-unit.target: $code_point 应该是代表Unicode代码点的无符号整数。

trans-unit.source: $coll->le($str, "abc\x{FFFF}") works like $coll->lt($str, "abd") almost, but the latter has a problem that you should know which letter is next to c . For a certain language where ch as the next letter, "abch" is greater than "abc\x{FFFF}" , but less than "abd" .
trans-unit.target: $coll->le($str, "abc\x{FFFF}") 工作原理与 $coll->lt($str, "abd") 差不多，但是后者有一个问题，您应该知道旁边是哪个字母 c 。对于 ch 作为下一个字母的特定语言， "abch" 大于 "abc\x{FFFF}" ，但小于 "abd" 。

trans-unit.source: $config is optional. If given, sets config and calls load_handlers.
trans-unit.target: $config 是可选的。如果给定，则设置config并调用load_handlers。

trans-unit.source: $directories must be only the directory portion of the path on systems that have the concept of a volume or that have path syntax that differentiates files from directories.
trans-unit.target: $directories 在具有卷概念或具有区分文件和目录的路径语法的系统上，$ directories必须仅是路径的目录部分。

trans-unit.source: $equal_in_locale will be true if the collation locale specifies a dictionary-like ordering that ignores space characters completely and which folds case.
trans-unit.target: $equal_in_locale 如果排序规则语言环境指定了类似于字典的顺序，则该顺序将完全忽略空格字符并折叠大小写，则$ equal_in_locale将为true。

trans-unit.source: $failed is a hash ref of all the test scripts that failed. Each key is the name of a test script, each value is another hash representing how that script failed. Its keys are these:
trans-unit.target: $failed 是所有失败的测试脚本的哈希引用。每个键是测试脚本的名称，每个值是代表该脚本如何失败的另一个哈希。其关键是：

trans-unit.source: $failed should be empty if everything passed.
trans-unit.target: $failed 如果一切顺利，则$ failed应该为空。

trans-unit.source: $filepath is the input POD to read and $outputpath is where to write POD syntax error messages. Either argument may be a scalar indicating a file-path, or else a reference to an open filehandle. If unspecified, the input-file it defaults to \*STDIN , and the output-file defaults to \*STDERR .
trans-unit.target: $filepath 是要读取的输入POD，而 $outputpath 是要写入POD语法错误消息的位置。自变量可以是表示文件路径的标量，也可以是对打开的文件句柄的引用。如果未指定，则输入文件默认为 \*STDIN ，输出文件默认为 \*STDERR 。

trans-unit.source: $hinthash is a reference to a hash containing the value of %^H when the caller was compiled, or undef if %^H was empty. Do not modify the values of this hash, as they are the actual values stored in the optree.
trans-unit.target: $hinthash 是对在调用者进行编译时包含 %^H 值的哈希的引用；如果 %^H 为空，则为 undef 。不要修改此哈希值，因为它们是存储在optree中的实际值。

trans-unit.source: $hinthash is a reference to a hash containing the value of %^H when the caller was compiled, or undef if %^H was empty. Do not modify the values of this hash, as they are the actual values stored in the optree.
trans-unit.target: $hinthash 是对在调用者进行编译时包含 %^H 值的哈希的引用；如果 %^H 为空，则为 undef 。不要修改此哈希值，因为它们是存储在optree中的实际值。

trans-unit.source: $isdst is true if the specified time occurs during Daylight Saving Time, false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: $isdst 如果指定的时间在夏令时期间发生，则$ isdst为true，否则为false。

trans-unit.source: $length bytes. The only circumstances that this function will not is if end-of-file or an IO error is encountered.
trans-unit.target: $length 个字节。只有在遇到文件结尾或IO错误时，才可以使用此功能。

trans-unit.source: $m is currently just a copy of the original number. The relation between $e and $m will stay always the same, though their real values might change.
trans-unit.target: $m 当前只是原始数字的副本。 $e 和 $m 之间的关系将始终保持不变，尽管它们的实际值可能会更改。

trans-unit.source: $mday is the day of the month and $mon the month in the range 0..11 , with 0 indicating January and 11 indicating December. This makes it easy to get a month name from a list:
trans-unit.target: $mday 是月份中的月份， $mon 是月份中的月份，范围是 0..11 ，其中0表示1月，11表示12月。这使得从列表中获取月份名称变得容易：

trans-unit.source: $modeflags can be the following constants from the Fcntl module (in the style of the
trans-unit.target: $modeflags 可以是 Fcntl 模块中的以下常量（以

trans-unit.source: $path defines the file name (which need not exist), $data the file contents, and $opt is a reference to a hash of attributes which may be used to override the default attributes (fields in the tar header), which are described above in the Accessors section.
trans-unit.target: $path 定义文件名（不需要存在）， $data 文件内容， $opt 是对属性哈希的引用，该哈希可用于覆盖默认属性（tar头中的字段），对此进行了描述以上在“访问者”部分。

trans-unit.source: $perms is the file permissions bits to use if new database files are created. This parameter is mandatory even when not creating a new database. The permissions will be reduced by the user's umask so the usual value here would be 0666, or if some very private data then 0600. (See umask.)
trans-unit.target: $perms 是在创建新数据库文件时使用的文件权限位。即使不创建新数据库，此参数也是必需的。权限将通过用户的umask减少，因此此处的通常值为0666，或者如果某些非常私有的数据则为0600。（请参阅umask。）

trans-unit.source: $priority can specify a level, or a level and a facility. Levels and facilities can be given as strings or as macros. When using the eventlog mechanism, priorities DEBUG and INFO are mapped to event type informational , NOTICE and WARNING to warning and ERR to EMERG to error .
trans-unit.target: $priority 可以指定一个级别，或者一个级别和设施。级别和功能可以字符串或宏形式给出。使用事件 eventlog 机制时，将优先级 DEBUG 和 INFO 映射到事件类型 informational ，将 NOTICE 和 WARNING 映射到 warning ，将 ERR 映射到 EMERG 到 error 。

trans-unit.source: $reg can also be interpolated into a larger regexp:
trans-unit.target: $reg 也可以插值到更大的regexp中：

trans-unit.source: $replacement can be a CODEREF , taking the matching part as an argument, and returning a string to replace the matching part (a bit similar to s/(..)/$coderef->($1)/e).
trans-unit.target: $replacement 可以是 CODEREF ，将匹配部分作为参数，然后返回一个字符串来替换匹配部分（有点类似于 s/(..)/$coderef->($1)/e ）。

trans-unit.source: $replacement can be a CODEREF , taking the matching part as an argument, and returning a string to replace the matching part (a bit similar to s/(..)/$coderef->($1)/eg).
trans-unit.target: $replacement 可以是 CODEREF ，将匹配部分作为参数，然后返回一个字符串以替换匹配部分（有点类似于 s/(..)/$coderef->($1)/eg ）。

trans-unit.source: $string is used as a string under character semantics (see
trans-unit.target: $string 用作字符语义下的字符串（请参见

trans-unit.source: $wday is the day of the week, with 0 indicating Sunday and 3 indicating Wednesday. $yday is the day of the year, in the range 0..364 (or 0..365 in leap years.)
trans-unit.target: $wday 是星期几，0表示星期日，3表示星期三。 $yday 是一年中的一天，范围为 0..364 （或 0..365 年为0..365）。

trans-unit.source: $year contains the number of years since 1900. To get a 4-digit year write:
trans-unit.target: $year 包含自1900年以来的年数。要获得4位数字的年，请输入：

trans-unit.source: ${$aref}[3] is too hard to read, so you can write $aref->[3] instead.
trans-unit.target: ${$aref}[3] 太难读了，因此可以改写 $aref->[3] 。

trans-unit.source: ${$href}{red} is too hard to read, so you can write $href->{red} instead.
trans-unit.target: ${$href}{red} 太难读了，因此您可以改写 $href->{red} 。

trans-unit.source: %Config cannot always be trusted, however, because it was built at compile time. If perl was built in one place, then transferred elsewhere, some values may be wrong. The values may even have been edited after the fact.
trans-unit.target: %Config 但是，％Config不能总是受信任的，因为它是在编译时构建的。如果perl建在一个地方，然后转移到其他地方，则某些值可能是错误的。这些值甚至可以在事后进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: %DB::dbline is an alias for %{"::_<current_file"} , which contains breakpoints and actions keyed by line number in the currently-selected file, either explicitly chosen with the debugger's f command, or implicitly by flow of execution.
trans-unit.target: %DB::dbline 是 %{"::_<current_file"} 的别名，它包含断点和操作，这些断点和操作由当前选择的文件中的行号键入，可以通过调试器的 f 命令显式选择，也可以通过以下流程隐式地选择：执行。

trans-unit.source: %Module::CoreList::version is implemented via Module::CoreList::TieHashDelta using this hash of delta changes.
trans-unit.target: %Module::CoreList::version 使用此增量变化哈希值通过 Module::CoreList::TieHashDelta 实现。

trans-unit.source: %ext_map is a hashref whose keys are file extensions and whose values are modules used to load matching files:
trans-unit.target: %ext_map 是一个hashref，其键是文件扩展名，其值是用于加载匹配文件的模块：

trans-unit.source: %table is an ordinary hash, and we get a list of keys from it, sort the keys, and loop over the keys as usual. The only use of references is in line 10. $table{$country} looks up the key $country in the hash and gets the value, which is a reference to an array of cities in that country. Use Rule 1 says that we can recover the array by saying @{$table{$country}} . Line 10 is just like
trans-unit.target: %table 是一个普通的哈希，我们从中获取键列表，对键进行排序，然后像往常一样遍历键。引用的唯一用途是在第10行中。 $table{$country} 在哈希中查找键 $country 并获取值，该值是对该国家中一系列城市的引用。使用规则1表示，我们可以通过说 @{$table{$country}} 恢复数组。第10行就像
&runtests 默认情况下，＆runtests由 Test::Harness 导出。

trans-unit.source: &utf8::Any must be the last line in the definition.
trans-unit.target: &utf8::Any 必须是定义中的最后一行。

trans-unit.source: <FILEHANDLE> may also be spelled readline(*FILEHANDLE). See readline.
trans-unit.target: <FILEHANDLE> 也可以拼写成 readline(*FILEHANDLE) 。参见readline。

trans-unit.source: <=> sort operators. It is possible to make multiple passes over your data, building indices to make the upcoming sort more efficient, and to use what is known as the OM (Orcish Maneuver) to cache the sort keys in advance. The cache lookup, while a good idea, can itself be a source of slowdown by enforcing a double pass over the data - once to setup the cache, and once to sort the data. Using pack() to extract the required sort key into a consistent string can be an efficient way to build a single string to compare, instead of using multiple sort keys, which makes it possible to use the standard, written in c and fast, perl sort() function on the output, and is the basis of the GRT (Guttman Rossler Transform). Some string combinations can slow the GRT down, by just being too plain complex for its own good.
trans-unit.target: <=> 排序运算符。可以对数据进行多次传递，建立索引以使即将进行的排序更加有效，并可以使用称为 OM （Orcish Maneuver）的方式提前缓存排序键。高速缓存查找虽然是个好主意，但它本身可以通过强制对数据执行两次传递来降低速度-一次是设置高速缓存，一次是对数据进行排序。使用 pack() 将所需的排序键提取到一致的字符串中可以是构建单个字符串进行比较的有效方法，而不是使用多个排序键，这使得可以使用以 c 编写的标准和快速的perl 输出的 sort() 函数，是 GRT 的基础（古特曼·罗斯勒变换）。某些字符串组合会因过于复杂而无法正常运行，从而降低 GRT 的速度。

trans-unit.source: <package Foo VERSION> is also checked for. The first version declaration found is used, but this may change as it differs from how Perl does it.
trans-unit.target: <package Foo VERSION 还检查了<package Foo VERSION >。使用找到的第一个版本声明，但这可能会更改，因为它与Perl的方式不同。

trans-unit.source: ($m,$e) = $x->parts(); is just a shortcut giving you both of them.
trans-unit.target: ($m,$e) = $x->parts(); 只是给你们两个的捷径。

trans-unit.source: ($m,$e) = $x->parts() is just a shortcut that gives you both of them in one go. Both the returned mantissa and exponent have a sign.
trans-unit.target: ($m,$e) = $x->parts() 只是一种捷径，可让您一次完成两个任务。返回的尾数和指数都有一个符号。

trans-unit.source: (?>pattern) does not disable backtracking altogether once it has matched. It is still possible to backtrack past the construct, but not into it. So ((?>a*)|(?>b*))ar will still match "bar".
trans-unit.target: (?>pattern) 匹配后不会完全禁用回溯。仍然有可能回溯过去，但不能回溯到其中。因此 ((?>a*)|(?>b*))ar 仍将匹配“ bar”。

trans-unit.source: (?[ ]) is a regex-compile-time construct. Any attempt to use something which isn't knowable at the time the containing regular expression is compiled is a fatal error. In practice, this means just three limitations:
trans-unit.target: (?[ ]) 是一个正则表达式编译时构造。任何试图使用在编译包含正则表达式时都不知道的东西的尝试都是致命错误。实际上，这意味着三个限制：

trans-unit.source: (condition) should be one of: 1) an integer in parentheses (which is valid if the corresponding pair of parentheses matched); 2) a look-ahead/look-behind/evaluate zero-width assertion; 3) a name in angle brackets or single quotes (which is valid if a group with the given name matched); or 4) the special symbol (R) (true when evaluated inside of recursion or eval). Additionally the R may be followed by a number, (which will be true when evaluated when recursing inside of the appropriate group), or by &NAME , in which case it will be true only when evaluated during recursion in the named group.
trans-unit.target: (condition) 应为以下之一：1）括号中的整数（如果对应的一对括号匹配则有效）； 2）前瞻/后视/评估零宽度断言； 3）用尖括号或单引号引起的名称（如果与给定名称的组匹配，则该名称有效）；或4）特殊符号（R）（在递归或eval内部求值时为true）。另外，R后面可能跟有一个数字（当在适当的组内递归时评估时为true ）或 &NAME ，在这种情况下，仅当在命名组中递归时进行评估时为true。

trans-unit.source: * Note: \c? maps to ordinal 127 (DEL ) on ASCII platforms, but since ordinal 127 is a not a control character on EBCDIC machines, \c? instead maps on them to APC , which is 255 in 0037 and 1047, and 95 in POSIX-BC.
trans-unit.target: * 注意： \c? 映射到ASCII平台上的序数127（ DEL ），但是由于序数127在EBCDIC机器上不是控制字符， \c? 而是将它们映射到 APC ，在0037和1047中为255，在POSIX-BC中为95。

trans-unit.source: *foo = *bar makes the typeglobs themselves synonymous while *foo = \$bar makes the SCALAR portions of two distinct typeglobs refer to the same scalar value. This means that the following code:
trans-unit.target: *foo = *bar 使它们自己成为同义词，而 *foo = \$bar 使两个不同的typeglob的SCALAR部分引用相同的标量值。这意味着下面的代码：

trans-unit.source: *foo{IO} is an alternative to the *HANDLE mechanism given in Typeglobs and Filehandles in perldata for passing filehandles into or out of subroutines, or storing into larger data structures. Its disadvantage is that it won't create a new filehandle for you. Its advantage is that you have less risk of clobbering more than you want to with a typeglob assignment. (It still conflates file and directory handles, though.) However, if you assign the incoming value to a scalar instead of a typeglob as we do in the examples below, there's no risk of that happening.
trans-unit.target: *foo{IO} 是perldata的Typeglobs和Filehandles中提供的 *HANDLE 机制的替代方法，用于将文件句柄传入或传出子例程，或存储到更大的数据结构中。它的缺点是不会为您创建新的文件句柄。它的优点是，与分配typeglob分配相比，您遭受破坏的风险更低。 （但是，它仍然会压缩文件和目录句柄。）但是，如果将传入值分配给标量而不是我们在下面的示例中所做的typeglob，则不会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: *foo{NAME} and *foo{PACKAGE} are the exception, in that they return strings, rather than references. These return the package and name of the typeglob itself, rather than one that has been assigned to it. So, after *foo=*Foo::bar , *foo will become "*Foo::bar" when used as a string, but *foo{PACKAGE} and *foo{NAME} will continue to produce "main" and "foo", respectively.
trans-unit.target: *foo{NAME} 和 *foo{PACKAGE} 是例外，因为它们返回字符串，而不是引用。它们返回typeglob本身的包和名称，而不是已分配给它的名称。因此，在 *foo=*Foo::bar ， *foo 用作字符串时将变为“ * Foo :: bar”，但是 *foo{PACKAGE} 和 *foo{NAME} 将继续产生“ main”和“ foo”。

trans-unit.source: *foo{THING} returns undef if that particular THING hasn't been used yet, except in the case of scalars. *foo{SCALAR} returns a reference to an anonymous scalar if $foo hasn't been used yet. This might change in a future release.
trans-unit.target: *foo{THING} 如果尚未使用特定的THING，则* foo {THING}会返回undef，但标量情况除外。如果尚未使用$ foo， *foo{SCALAR} 将返回对匿名标量的引用。这可能会在将来的版本中更改。

trans-unit.source: ++ behaves as the other operators above, except that if it is a string matching the format /^[a-zA-Z]*[0-9]*\z/ the string increment described in perlop is used.
trans-unit.target: ++ 的行为与上述其他运算符相同，不同之处在于，如果它是与 /^[a-zA-Z]*[0-9]*\z/ 格式匹配的字符串，则使用perlop中描述的字符串增量。

trans-unit.source: -X, chdir, chmod, chown, chroot, fcntl, glob, ioctl, link, lstat, mkdir, open, opendir, readlink, rename, rmdir, stat, symlink, sysopen, umask, unlink, utime
trans-unit.target: -X ， chdir ， chmod ， chown ， chroot 环境， fcntl ， glob ， ioctl ， link ， lstat ， mkdir ， open ， opendir ， readlink ， rename ， rmdir ， stat ， symlink ， sysopen ， umask 的， unlink ， utime
